dialogue.htmlContent:

To your far right, past the shelving units, you see that dozens of black, silicone sex dolls have been lined up against the wall. To either side of the entrance, and scattered throughout the store, are tall, muscular wolf-boy security guards. With such a heavy security presence, you're convinced that this store's clientèle must be very important and wealthy indeed.
